posts.post_title: FS/FT:  T206 Bresnahan and Marquard(s) - PSA 4 and 4.5(s)
posts.post_content:
I currently have the following for sale:

T206 Bresnahan, portrait, PSA 4.5 - $195
T206 Marquard, portrait, PSA 4.5 - $195
T206 Marquard, hands at thighs, PSA 4 - **ON HOLD**

Front and back scans are below.  Shipping with signature confirmation included in prices.  Paypal ok with no additional surcharge.  Please email me at [url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url] if you would like any.

Would also trade any or all for a nice T206 Ed Foster.

Regards,
Adam
[url]aamoniz@yahoo.com[/url]
Marquard Hands at Thighs now on hold for a board member, others still available.
